article_title: US health secretary urges NC residents to shop around for insurance
article_text:
NC has among the highest ACA rates in the nation

Secretary Sylvia Mathews Burwell says sticker shock can be avoided

Most enrolled in NC receive federal subsidies

article_metadata.news-keywords: ACA, Affordable, Care, Act, Obamacare, HHS, Sylvia, Mathews, Burwell, Rates, Enroll
article_metadata.description: As North Carolina is reeling from some of the highest health insurance rates in the nation under the Affordable Care Act, US health secretary Sylvia Mathews Burwell on Monday advised residents to shop around for better deals.
article_metadata.title: US health secretary urges NC residents to shop around for insurance | News & Observer
